mapper.update: MERGE INTO WDM.AX_A_PRECORD USING DUAL ON (AGENT_ID = #{agent_id}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET dep_nm = #{dep_nm}, join_date = #{join_date}, work_time = #{work_time}, work = #{work}, age = #{age}, mey_yn = #{mey_yn}, gender = #{gender}, work_yn = #{work_yn}, leave_date = #{leave_date} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (agent_id, dep_nm, join_date, work_time, work, age, mey_yn, gender, work_yn, leave_date) VALUES (#{agent_id}, #{dep_nm}, #{join_date}, #{work_time}, #{work}, #{age}, #{mey_yn}, #{gender}, #{work_yn}, #{leave_date} )
